sqlMap.select: SELECT SER_INVOKE_INS_ID ,SER_INVOKE_INS_NAME FROM SER_INVOKE_INS WHERE STATE = 'A'

SELECT A.SER_INVOKE_INS_NAME ,C.NAME ,B.CYCLE_VALUE,B.CUTMS_VALUE,B.EFFECT_STATE,TO_CHAR(B.CONFIG_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mi') CONFIG_TIME,B.CTL_C_2_COMP_ID ,B.CYCLE_TYPE FROM SER_INVOKE_INS A ,CTL_COUNTERMS_2_COMP B , CONTROL_COUNTERMS C WHERE A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID = B.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID AND B.CC_CD = C.CC_CD AND B.EFFECT_STATE = 'A' AND A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID = #data# ORDER BY B.CC_SEQ

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM SER_INVOKE_INS A ,CTL_COUNTERMS_2_COMP B , CONTROL_COUNTERMS C ,COMPONENT D , SERVICE E WHERE A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID = B.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID AND B.CC_CD = C.CC_CD AND B.EFFECT_STATE = 'A' AND A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.SERVICE_ID = E.SERVICE_ID AND A.STATE = 'A'
A.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# A.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY CTL_C_2_COMP_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT A.SER_INVOKE_INS_NAME ,C.NAME ,B.CYCLE_VALUE,B.CUTMS_VALUE,B.EFFECT_STATE,TO_CHAR(B.CONFIG_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mi') CONFIG_TIME,B.CTL_C_2_COMP_ID ,B.CYCLE_TYPE ,B.CC_SEQ ,E.SERVICE_CN_NAME ,D.NAME DNAME FROM SER_INVOKE_INS A ,CTL_COUNTERMS_2_COMP B , CONTROL_COUNTERMS C ,COMPONENT D , SERVICE E WHERE A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID = B.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID AND B.CC_CD = C.CC_CD AND B.EFFECT_STATE = 'A' AND A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.SERVICE_ID = E.SERVICE_ID
A.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# A.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
AND A.STATE = 'A' ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID FROM SER_INVOKE_INS A WHERE A.STATE = 'A'
A.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# A.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#

SELECT C.SERVICE_ID , C.SERVICE_CN_NAME FROM COMPONENT A ,SER_INVOKE_INS B ,SERVICE C WHERE A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID = C.SERVICE_ID AND B.STATE = 'A' AND A.COMPONENT_ID = #data#

SELECT A.CTL_C_2_COMP_ID , A.CC_CD , A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID , A.CUTMS_VALUE ,A.EFFECT_STATE ,A.CYCLE_TYPE , A.CYCLE_VALUE ,B.COMPONENT_ID ,B.SERVICE_ID FROM CTL_COUNTERMS_2_COMP A , SER_INVOKE_INS B WHERE A.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID = B.SER_INVOKE_INS_ID AND CTL_C_2_COMP_ID = #ctlC2CompId#
